Name: Dixie Dew
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A peppermint fresh and zesty orange, bourbon-laced cocktail for late-night sipping.
Nutrition: One serving of Dixie Dew contains 173 calories
